posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Wiltse Portrait w/Cap SGC 45 Name Top and Bottom
posts.post_content:
I recently purchased this from JVSC, but realized I already have a Wiltse Portrait.  I'll sell it for what I paid $45 PayPal F&F, or trade it for '60s HOFers in EX to NM condition.
